name: Almost Like A Grand Strategy Game
name_original: Almost Like A Grand Strategy Game
description:
Almost Like A Grand Strategy Game is a simple grand strategy game. Eliminate all enemy factions and win the game by painting the map with your faction's color. You can build buildings in your provinces to add bonuses. Or, if you get tired of playing, you can choose 'Spectator' and watch the AIs slug it out. If you want to save your game's progress, you can download the FREE version of the game. It features a Save/Load system. Also consider supporting the dev :) I'd really appreciate it. Enjoy!!!

TIPS :

  • if your display resolution is lower than 1920x1080, playing on fullscreen is recommended.
  • if the game is laggy on your browser, follow the instructions here: https://blog.colonist.io/how-to-enable-webgl/ . If it doesn't work, download the game's free version for your OS.
